attributes.additional_details: The Queen is the head of the Commonwealth and is a household name in all of the world. I believe it what makes the United Kingdom powerful in the world. If we were to lose the monarchy, we would be ending the reign of the family that once ruled a third of the world. Not only that, but England and the United Kingdom has had the monarchy for 946 years, and is the face of Britain to the rest of the world. We would, therefore, no longer be unique in the world.
